name: Umbra, the Shadow Reaper
description: A monster that can absorb enemy attacks and use them to grow stronger, leaving the player vulnerable.

name: Venomhiss
description: A dragon that can poison its enemies, dealing damage over time and making them weak to attack.

name: The Wraithknight
description: A ghostly knight that drains the health of its enemies, dealing damage over time and becoming stronger.

name: The Blood Brood
description: A creature that can infect its enemies, dealing damage over time and spreading its detrimental effects to other targets.

name: The Cribrius
description: A powerful, aggressive monster that deals massive damage in close combat, with a shriek that stuns its enemies.

name: The Spectra
description: A monster that shoots laser-like attacks, dealing damage from a distance, and can phaze enemies, making them vulnerable to attacks.

name: Ksdkazi
description: A four-armed monster with sharp blades for hands, dealing massive damage in close combat, and sprinting rapidly around the battlefield.

name: Lord Vaut
description: A powerful undead warlord that summons an army of undead minions to do its bidding, overwhelming the player with sheer numbers.

name: Voragg draconia
description: A serpent creature that deals electrical damage from a distance and releases explosion blasts that stun the enemy, then perfect killing abilities as the foe doesn’t fully recover accordingly.

name: Janrek Everalè
description: a man of similar light structure construction but covered also standing statues human that kills lots of increasing tiny sparks rising burn
